name: Ext_R3_PlanDefinition_ac_co_description
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.PlanDefinition.action.condition.description for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents PlanDefinition.action.condition.description from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PlanDefinition|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Natural language description of the condition
element.definition: A brief, natural language description of the condition that effectively communicates the intended semantics.
element.comment: `PlanDefinition.action.condition.description` maps to R4 `PlanDefinition.action.condition.expression`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
